4318370.name: MAZY
4318370.description:
MAZY is a first-person PS1-style horror game where you must solve a series of minigames while navigating procedurally generated mazes, avoiding hostile clowns and deadly traps designed to make survival harder.

To help you along the way, you can purchase power-ups from vending machines scattered throughout the maze, provided you collect enough coins while exploring.

You will face increasingly challenging levels with newly unlocked traps, more clowns and other creatures hunting you down, each with their own unique behavior.

You will encounter a wide variety of constantly changing minigames, including memory puzzles, a Tetris-like mode, a mini Pac-Man and many more.

Features

  • Intricate procedurally generated mazes

  • Three different types of clowns

  • A creepy spider and a disturbing pig

  • Multiple traps unlocked as you progress

  • Collect coins to purchase in-game assistance, such as a map

  • Five stages with increasing difficulty

  • A wide variety of minigames

MAZY is not an easy game. You’ll need to carefully decide how to spend the limited coins available if you want to gain an advantage and survive for as long as possible.
